paragraph.text: I am an enthusiastic full stack software engineer that is passionate about solving problems and finding the best solutions.

I had a bachelor in Political Science from a prestigious university in Thailand. I had attended Lambda School for Web Development training for 9 months. Before that, I had little knowledge of web development. Today, I have several web JavaScript applications in my portfolio built with React, Angular, Node/Express, and experience working in an agile environment.

subtitle: A star performer, an organizer, and a team builder

paragraph.text: I have always give the best to every job I've ever done. Having always been a top performer that gets along well with everybody, I had been promoted or selected for leadership positions or tasks such becoming a Student Team Lead at Lambda School.

I also always take charges in organizing workspace, delegating tasks, and holding professional and casual meeting for teams or groups. I love helping in improving efficiency and creating a fun and supportive environment where everybody can flourish and shine.
I am currently looking for a software engineering position in a fun and professional environment.

Definitely hit me up if you want someone who gives more than 100% and constantly reaches for the stars, is fun and always brings laughter and positivity to your team, and is eager to be your successful hire!
